title: Robotics and IoT-Based Science Language Learning Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level comprehension of scientific terminology and basic awareness of IoT concepts
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment utilizing digital devices (tablets, sensors, etc.) and robotics/physical manipulation tools

learning_goals: Learners can explain core terminology in science fields with 80% accuracy through robot-human interaction activities.
Learners can write an English report describing scientific phenomena using IoT-based experimental data.
Learners can perform English communication at over 70% proficiency during problem-solving processes with peers using collaboration tools (e.g., robot control apps).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
